mapper.insert: INSERT INTO festa_reply(frno, contentid, frcontent, id, nickname, frstatecode) VALUES(seq_frno.nextval, #{contentid}, #{frcontent}, #{id}, #{nickname}, 'Y')
mapper.select: SELECT frno, contentid, id, nickname, frcontent, frregist, fredit, frstatecode FROM (SELECT rownum rn, frno, contentid, id, nickname, frcontent, frregist, fredit, frstatecode FROM festa_reply WHERE contentid = #{contentid} AND frno > 0 AND frstatecode = 'Y' AND rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}) WHERE rn > (#{cri.pageNum} -1) * #{cri.amount}
